name: Interactive media
description: You create prototypes of interactive media products for your client by using iterations, user research and examples from the professional field.

name: Development
description: You program and integrate proofs of concepts based on validated requirements and documented with version control tools.

name: Design
description: You craft quality visual designs with a professional toolset.

name: Research
description: You apply exploratory research methods, driven by a curious and critical attitude.

name: Communication
description: You communicate effectively with your stakeholders (text and visuals) about the progress of your project and the motivation of your choices.

name: Professional identity
description: You present your professional identity as a media designer in a portfolio that shows your growth and choices.
